title: Model Rockets
description: Three . . . two . . . one . . . liftoff! Building model rockets has been a hobby since the 1950s. Model Rockets provides details about the parts of a model rocket and how to launch one in the air. The photographs and diagrams illustrate this enjoyable hobby and the competitions that go along with it.
meta: competitions, controller, designs, engine, fuel, hobby, launchpad, model, parachute
Use the strategy of asking and answering questions to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Exclamation Marks : Identify and use exclamation marks
Syllable Patterns : Recognize and understand syllable patterns

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
